DOC.brief_title: Comparison Biomarkers Based Fine-Needle Aspiration Women Increased Normal Risk Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare specific biomarkers , include cellular morphology ( cytology ) , proliferation index ( Ki-67 ) , p53 expression , LOH chromosome 9p locus DS9157 , fine needle aspirate specimen woman increase v normal risk breast cancer . - Determine whether specimen adequate perform biomarker assay whether technique could use general outpatient setting . - Determine whether biomarker level patient concordant discordant individual clinical risk breast cancer . - Determine whether 1 biomarkers distinguish high-risk control patient . - Correlate specific biomarkers change biomarker level pathologic diagnosis breast biopsy . OUTLINE : Patients undergo fine needle aspiration normal appear breast tissue prior begin elective surgery . Specimens analyze presence specific biomarkers . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 156 patient accrue study within 3 year .
